page.title: 11Entertainment
page.content: People living within this block must travel to find entertainment outside their homes and away from television, since there is not even one pub in the area. However there is an amateur theatre in Bromyard (and many pubs) three miles away and permanent theatres in Hereford and Worcester each fifteen miles away, and also home in their respective year to the peripatetic Three Choirs Festival. In an area of festivals, residents can be intellectually entertained at Malvern or Ludlow, while Bromyard hosts an increasingly successful folk festival each autumn and also has its annual five day Gala. Nearer to home, Stanford Bishop has a flourishing annual harvest supper, well attended by everyone living locally. Largest social gatherings tend to be at farm sales and funerals.
